document_data.name: Ryxyg
document_data.region: [[Deep Wastes]]{{Cite adventurers league/Writhing in the Dark|6}}
document_data.races: [[Mind flayer]]s{{Cite adventurers league/The Malady of Elventree|31}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Ryxyg''' was a [[mind flayer]] enclave in the [[Deep Wastes]], located a few miles beneath [[Sporedome]].
document_data.Trade: The mind flayers of Ryxyg engaged in peaceful trade with the [[myconid]]s of Sporedome.
document_data.History: In the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], the mind flayers of Ryxyg allied with the myconids of Sporedome and with a group of adventurers to repel an invading force of [[fire giant]]s from [[Szith Morcane]].{{Cite adventurers league/Szith Morcane Unbound|14}}
document_data.Inhabitants:
The inhabitants of Ryxyg were not as aggressive as mind flayers of other colonies, and did not actively pursue slaves. However, they did not refrain from enslaving attackers to the city.

In the late 1480s DR, the ambassador of Ryxyg was the mind flayer [[Glorghakt]].
